context: Test handling of vague or unclear skill requests

checklist.name: Vagueness Recognition
checklist.description: Recognizes that the initial request is too vague to proceed

checklist.name: Clarifying Questions
checklist.description: Asks targeted follow-up questions to understand the actual need

checklist.name: No Premature Generation
checklist.description: Does not generate placeholder/generic files before understanding the purpose

checklist.name: User Guidance
checklist.description: Helps user refine their idea into a concrete, actionable skill definition
